repairedDockerfile:
FROM debian:jessie 
MAINTAINER Bruno Adel√© "bruno@adele.im" 
USER root 
ENV DEBIAN_FRONTEND noninteractive 
ENV TERM xterm-256color 
ENV DISPLAY :0 
# Upgrade the distribution 
RUN apt-get update && \  
apt-get -yf upgrade && \  
apt-get -yf dist-upgrade && apt-get -y --no-install-recommends install apt-utils curl nano git && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

# Clean the cache and unused packages 
RUN apt-get clean 
RUN apt-get autoremove 
RUN rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* /tmp/* /var/tmp/* 

CMD bash
